content: west coast mittens by diana twiss yarn 60 grams 2 oz of dk yarn needles 3 25mm or 3 5mm dpn double pointed needles tapestry needle waste yarn scissors size women s medium to make it larger use slightly larger needles 3 5mm to make a smaller mitt use 2 75 needles gauge a mitten is a swatch knitted in the round this is a simple and straightforward knit for a set of half-mitts the mock rib pattern gives some stretch like a rib stitch but it is faster at round 19 you have a choice to make a simple thumb opening or to set stitches aside for a knitted thumb mock rib pattern this pattern is done on an even number of stitches row 1 knit one purl one repeat to end in other words *k1 p1* row 2 knit all around these two row make the pattern abbreviations m1l make one left left-leaning increase m1r make one right right-leaning increase west coast mittens updated may 22 2021 1 instructions knit two identical mitts cuff cast on 36 stitches distribute stitches so there are 12 stitches on each needle join in the round knit 6 rounds this will create a curled edge knit in mock rib pattern for 11 repeats then knit row 1 you will have 12 purl bumps that you can count thumb gusset increases for the thumb gusset all happen on needle 1 after an increase round on needle 1 you will knit two rounds see instructions below setting up the thumb gusset needle 1 knit 3 purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 knit 6 12 stitches needle 2 knit needle 3 knit round 1 increase round needle 1 knit 3 purl 1 m1l knit 1 m1r purl 1 knit 6 14 stitches needle 2 knit needle 3 knit rounds 2 and 3 knit in pattern which means knit the knit stitches and purl the purl stitches when you do this in this instance it is mostly knit so remember to purl the 2 purl stitches on needle 1 increasing for the thumb gusset round 4 needle 1 knit 3 purl 1 knit 1 m1l knit 1 m1r knit 1 purl 1 knit 6 16 stitches needle 2 knit needle 3 knit rounds 5 and 6 knit in pattern remembering to purl the 2 purl stitches on needle 1 continue increasing on needle 1 every third round doing your increases in the gusset section which is bordered by the purl stitches increase until you have 13 stitches in the gusset section and 24 stitches on needle 1 or follow the directions below west coast mittens updated may 22 2021 2 round 7 needle 1 knit 3 purl 1 knit 1 m1l knit 3 m1r knit 1 purl 1 knit 6 18 stitches needle 2 knit needle 3 knit rounds 8 and 9 knit in pattern remembering to purl the 2 purl stitches on needle 1 round 10 needle 1 knit 3 purl 1 knit 1 m1l
